Definition: State that the plant is located in
City that the plant is located in
County that the plant is located in
Code for Balancing Authority that the plant is located in
Name of Balancing Authority that the plant is located in

Code for Independent System Operator (ISO) or Regional Transmission Operator (RTO)
that the plant is connected to
NERC region that the plant is located in
A filter used in the RMI Utility Transition Hub Portal. “Owned” lines are utility-owned power plants. “Total” lines include Purchased Power, Energy Efficiency, and Demand Response.
Operating status from EIA (end of year)
Out of Service, expected to return to service in next year
Construction complete, not yet in operation
Month that the generator began operating
Year that the generator began operating

Source of energy. Options include Net Generation (generation from owned power plants), Wholesale Power Purchases, Net Exchanges, Net Wheeled Power, Transmission by Others Losses, Energy Efficiency, and Demand Response.

Methodology: technology_rmi is a more coarse technology grouping than technology_eia, used to connect EIA and FERC datasets.

Definition: Synthesis Gas Derived from Petroleum Coke
Fuel Type Category, determined by RMI groupings for display in the Utility Transition Hub Portal

Methodology: Generation from EIA923, allocated to each generator in EIA860 based on a priority of: (a) net generation from EIA923 generator-level data (b) net generation from EIA923 prime mover/fuel type data, allocated to all generators with the same prime mover and fuel type based on capacity then multiplied by ownership fraction of each generator by utility.

Fuel consumption from EIA923, allocated to each generator in EIA860 based on a priority of: (a) net generation from EIA923 generator-level data (b) net generation from EIA923 prime mover/fuel type data, allocated to all generators with the same prime mover and fuel type based on capacity then multiplied by ownership fraction of each generator by utility.

Definition: Emissions of carbon dioxide from fossil fuel combustion
Methodology:
= fuel_consumed [MMBtu] * emissions_factor [MMT of CO2/MMBtu]
emissions_factor specific to each fuel_type_code

Definition: Emissions of nitrous oxides from fossil fuel combustion
Methodology: plant-level NOx emissions, allocated to each generator based on capacity, then multiplied by ownership fraction of each generator by utility.

Definition: Emissions of sulphur oxides from fossil fuel combustion
Methodology: plant-level SOx emissions, allocated to each generator based on capacity, then multiplied by ownership fraction of each generator by utility.
